summary: This fort has long been invaded by bandits,until the Dragonborn was asked to do something about it
descriptionHtml:
FORT RIVERSTONE-An immersive player home.

>>>>HEARTHFIRE Required<<<<<
-DO NOT STORE ITEMS OR FOLLOWERS IN THE FORT BEFORE YOU ARE GRANTED ITS OWNERSHIP-
-No,seriously,don't do it,the will vanish into thin air.


After the name of the Dragonborn becomes well known in Skyrim (after completing "The way of the voice",the player will recieve a letter from a (hopefully not naked) courier.A group of bandits has overrun an old fort north of Ivarstead where the holds of whiterun,windhelm and the rift border with each other.Should the player manage to free the fort he will (after recieving another letter) be granted possession of the fort.

FEATURES

-New player home,inside of an old imperial fort.

-Fully navmeshed

-Compatible with My home is Your Home mod.

-Integrated support for "Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions" mod.(you can move wife and kids in the fort)

-Full crafting Furnitures

-All storage is safe and does not respawn.WARNING! Do not store items in the fort untill you are granted it's ownership.

-Mannequins,Bookshelves,Display cases

-Personal carriage

-Respawning cow and chickens outside of the fort

-Shrines to the 8 divines
>Joking,Shrines to the NINE divines (Talos <3)

-Enchanting and alchemical furniture.

-Oven and Churn

-Plantable soils

-Fish Hatchery and underground pond.

-Working Trophy Bases

-One hell of a view

-Lore friendly

-Tested and bug free (if something does not look right let me know)

-Cleaned with tes5edit

!!!! I would advise to use this mod with aMidianBorn Imperial Forts,Rens HD Shrines,ELFX and skyrim HD 2k textures.
author: PCDug
